data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Generic Consequence Ledger with Financial Traceability. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.
